review_text:
Stayed at Ellen’s this weekend for a Centre graduation. Conveniently located to campus.
Ellen was a great host and very accommodating to our family’s ever changing needs, late check out, additional guests.
Her space is cozy and inviting.
Charming deck off kitchen to enjoy some privacy. Highly recommend her space!
Thank you !
Thanks for the stay !
What a lovely place to stay. We were only there overnight but will definitely return. Would have loved to use the kitchen; one of the best furnished air bnb kitchens I’ve ever seen! Loved the decor!
Great place to enjoy Danville. Close to Centre campus and downtown and south Danville. Very comfortable, classy, not pretentious, artistic, songbirds, quiet.

This was our first stay at Ellen’s Fourth Street Retreat, but certainly will not be our last. With an interesting architecture, it has all the amenities we needed. Visiting family nearby, we were able to walk to a nice, downtown Italian restaurant and did not need to drive anywhere during our stay. Pastries and coffee on the 2nd floor deck was a treat in the very quiet neighborhood was a treat.

Dear Ellen.
We loved it, a great place you have (and town) to relax.
We (incl our kids) loved it!!
Kind regards Roel and family
Ps just when I left my toothbrush in Louisville … you had some in stock for guests 😃

Beautiful place, felt very cozy. Enjoyed our time!
Our only negative is that the mattress on the king bed needs upgrading...it was fairly old and uncomfortable.

We loved the personal touches that made this feel more like a home. Very cute place and a lot of charm. Thank you for the high chair, pack n play, and plenty of extra linens, towels, pillows, and blankets. Very peaceful place! Our children loved the spiral staircase and upstairs room. We also appreciate the extra things like good coffee and teas, little bags of popcorn, and dinnerware for the children. We would definitely stay again.

Ellen's place is one of the nicest Airbnb's we have stayed at. It was clean, bright and cozy. Ellen has thought of everything to make your stay comfortable and restful. We look forward to staying again when visiting Danville.
This is my second stay at Ellen’s perfect little Airbnb. It has become a favorite stay for me when I travel to Danville

Beautiful place! Danville has a lot to do within walking distance of this place and great food options too.
Ellen and Macie were great hosts and replied quickly to our questions!
We enjoyed our stay very much!
Cute place with responsive host!
Super nice last minute place to stay for an event we had at Centre
This Airbnb is in a good location close to Main Street and the college. The host was easy to work with and flexible with check in.
What a great place to stay! The place was clean, bright, and homey. It was perfect for what we needed. Will definitely stay again!
Very spacious. Clean. Easy parking. Quiet at night. Short walk to downtown and campus.

I’m in pharmaceutical sales and have had to overnights in Danville many times. I have always stayed in hotels but this time several were all booked. Well thank goodness that happened because I stumbled upon Ellen’s little gem right in the heart of town! I loved Ellen’s place. It was cute, quaint, perfectly decorated and so comfortable. I walked down the street to one of the close by restaurants and had a wonderful time. From now on when I do my overnights in Danville, I will be staying at Ellen’s place and not a hotel!

This is a great spot to stay in downtown Danville. Everything you could possibly need, sparkling clean, and a great host. I needed to stay on short notice to visit a family member in the hospital and Ellen was very helpful and accommodating. As someone who works in the Bourbon industry, I can also confirm this is a great spot to stay over while touring the Kentucky Bourbon Trail. Lots of options in driving distance.
Such a cozy and cute place! Loved staying here. Felt right at home. Our heat went out at our home in 15 degree weather and she got us confirmed within the hour! Wonderful host.
great apartment in a great location!
Awesome place right near town. Spacious and upscale with everything you need.

this place was PERFECT for what we were looking for! it's a hidden gem in danville. all the colors and decor were just adorable. we really enjoyed our stay here. I highly recommend this to anyone looking for a comfortable, cozy place to stay in danville. definitely keeping it on our radar for the next time we come back! the "fireplace" was a hit with my group! we all huddled up next to it! so cute!
The house was clean, and ellen was great to communicate with!! will definitely stay there again!!
Wonderful, cute place!!! Loved the colors. Walked to college which was the reason we were there. Would definitely stay here again!
Such a fun, cheery, comfortable place. Lots of nice little "extras" too, like disposal toothbrushes. We'll definitely stay here again.
good relaxing place to take a load off after work. I enjoyed my stay
The 4th street retreat was great for my stay. Close to everything, clean, and accurately described on Airbnb.
Great stay! Clean, convenient. Would highly recommend!
Super cute apartment within walking distance to downtown Danville! Perfect for my 1 night stay! Thanks for being such a great host!
The host was very kind to accept our last minute reservation. The place was great. It was clean, very comfortable, and cute. It was a great location and very walkable.
Love staying here!!
Very nice accommodations. everything was immaculate and homey. very close to Centre College, walking distance to downtown. Very welcoming. Shower had good pressure. Would definitely stay again.

Ellen’s place was large and clean. We had everything we needed, bed was comfy, plenty of towels and kitchen and bathroom were well stocked. There is a little deck outside with a table and chairs. Could walk to Centre College and also to local restaurants.
Ellen and Macie were extremely helpful and accommodating. Their place is cute, clean, and convenient! We will definitely be back!
great apartment in a great location
Great place to stay! Would 100% reccomend
Loved the coziness!
Very nice apt with a spacious living room and bedroom, and a well appointed kitchen. Plenty of parking, and a great location near the newly renovated main street with dining and nightlife.

Ellen communicated very well with us about our stay, and we had a wonderful time. Everything listed was present, and even a few little extra travel toiletries as well. We really loved the location and the space, and will certainly stay here in the future when we're in the area.
Such a great place to stay!

Comfortable home on the bourbon trail. I slept better here than I usually do at home, high quality beds and bedding. Cozy furniture in the living room and everything we needed to cook all week in the kitchen. Very clean, beautiful back yard. Great Air BnB experience.

The bungalow is in perfect condition. No details are overlooked. Tastefully done with interesting themes. Huge TV. Very nice outdoor space. We used the hot tub, the fire pit and the grill. Half a mile to interesting places and very good places to eat. We would definitely stay again.
We had a wonderful stay! Great location and host!
Beautiful home, lovely backyard, and Brent was super responsive.
We had a great weekend at this cute house! Easy to walk everywhere, clean, lots of great amenities. We will definitely be back!
nice location.quick to get to town. outdoor space is great. nice tv but internet was a little sketchy. comfy beds

I stayed at Brents place about a week and a half. The house was very nice,clean and well stocked. Paper products, soaps dishes. Everything i needed. I came down to visit my grandson and he stayed with me most of the time. He enjoyed the swing set and play house. I strolled him around the neighboor hood. We had a great time. Thank you so much for the use of your air bnb. I would definitely consider staying again on one of my future trips.
We loved this bungalow! Nicely done, well-stocked, fun backyard in a nice location close to Main Street. We will definitely stay again!

Brent was very responsive to messages! Everything was clean, the beds were extremely comfortable and the sheets felt so amazing (even asked where they came from), the house was darling all the wood accents we just perfect! Unfortunately it rained while there so we didn’t get to use the hot tub or playground but looked great!! The speed queen washer and dryer is top notch!! You will not regret staying here! If back in the area will definitely book again!

The outside of space with a fire pit and hot tub were great for a small gathering with friends. The bourbon and Star Wars themed decorations were super fun. It’s the best Airbnb in Danville: affordable, beautiful, and a great space to stay or host.
Had a great stay! Home was just as pictured and more. Large TV for watching movies and shows. Beds were adjustable and super comfortable.
Brent was great! House was very nice with great backyard.
We absolutely loved the house, especially the hot tub and fenced in backyard for our dog. Walking distance to all things Danville has to offer!! We hope to be back soon!!
Loved the house and the hot tub. everything was as expected.

Although we were on a vacation as a couple, this Airbnb would be a perfect place for a family to land. Two lovely bedrooms, ample space to spread out in the living room with the option of turning the couch into another bed.
The kitchen has all the amenities for cooking including a full spice rack! The host has made it fun with a Star Wars/Baby Yoda motif along with the Bourbon Trail accents throughout the house. If you are cooking breakfast don’t miss using the R2D2 toaster! Because of the weather we couldn’t fully appreciate the enclosed backyard, but when the temperatures warm it will be awesome to enjoy the fire pit and for families with children the swing set. We did take time for a hot tub soak under the stars. The path from the house to the yard is well lit and additional lights in the yard make nights out nice. Brent’s place is within easy drives to many distilleries, local historical attractions (it is only two blocks to the Dollhouse Museum) and some great dining.
Brent's place was cozy and great for a weekend away with some R&R. Close location to the main business area of Danville. Brent was friendly and made the check in process seamless!
Gorgeous home!
Great host!! Very helpful. Very cute place.
Great place, beautiful town!

Brent’s place was fantastic for my husband, myself, and our 2 German Shepherds! We had a great time in the hot tub and exploring the surrounding historical areas. There were even physical restaurant menus inside of the place for us to browse through and various other pamphlets with activities in the area. The dogs had plenty of space to run around in the yard which was a plus! I highly recommend!
This is a hidden gem in Danville! As a local to the area it’s in a great spot, very walkable to downtown activities.
Great place and close to Centre college
had a small issue once we checked in and Brent responded immediately. his place was amazing, i only wish we could have stayed longer. great stay, even better host.

This was a perfect, inviting place to stay. Very, very clean and loved the decor. There was everything you needed. Also, if you had any questions, Brent answered promptly. Will definitely stay again if we are ever in the area
Thx
Tammy 😉
The house and backyard were soo nice! Not a detail left untouched. The beds slept great, the decor was adorable and the firepit/hottub were so nice to hang out and relax.
It was accurate to the description and photos, it had everything you needed with a great price.

This is such a great house!! Great location, walkable to town and campus. Awesome fire pit in the fenced back yard, adorable front porch for morning coffee. Large television with sectional sofa great for football games!! Comfy beds too! Will hope to stay again in the future!!

We really enjoyed our stay here! From the moment we pulled in the driveway, we felt like we were at a home-away-from-home. Beautiful mums and pumpkins and gourds were on the front steps and a lovely autumn wreath was on the door. Inside, each room was clean and spacious. Information about interesting things to do and places to eat was displayed near the front door. The pitcher of cold water in the refrigerator was a welcome surprise! Brent was very patient and accommodating when dealing with an issue of only having an old phone number for us. We would definitely want to stay here if we were in the area again!
Very comfortable beds and great living room set-up for relaxing.
Great local spot!

This was a beautiful place only thing I regret is not staying longer than just at a couple of days. The place was spotless and (as a huge Star Wars nerd I loved the coffee cups and decor sprinkled through out the home) the back yard was amazing and that hot tub after a long drive awesome if you’re looking for a place to stay I highly recommend this place very responsive host no matter the time of day 10/10 would stay again (and are actually already talking about coming back and staying)
Great place. Brent was incredibly responsive. We would definitely stay here again.

Great place to stay, especially if you're a bourbon enthusiast. Neighborhood isn't the best Danville has to offer, but its an easy town to get around and you are close to some beautiful tree lined streets, a wonderful college campus, and easy access to main roads. Can't say enough about the house, very cozy and welcoming and the temperpedic beds are great. The back yard was great too...completely private space to enjoy a great soak in the hot tub. We didn't take advantage of the firepit or grill because were both under the weather, but had everything you could need to enjoy those amenities. Plenty of seeting around the fire and plenty of utensils for grilling or roasting food over the pit. Personally loved the R2D2 toaster and blender as well as the other Star Wars touches in the house...but make no mistake the MAIN theme is all bourbon. Will not hesitate to book here again (as long as the price doesn't skyrocket like bouron prices have 😉 ). Seriously though, a really great place.
Great location and very cute and clean

This property was just as the pictures showed!! It was a beautifully restored home! We had everything we needed. I would highly recommend!! Thanks Brent for being extremely responsive!! Wonderful property and host!!
Well appointed nicely furnished home close to centre.
Brent's place was awesome! We were in town to move our daughter into Centre College. Close to campus. Can't wait to stay there again!

We really enjoyed our stay in Danville at Brent’s place. He was very responsive and super helpful, we were traveling for our anniversary and he made sure to make us feel special during our stay. Check in was super simple and the private backyard made for a great space to hang out. All finishings in this newly remodeled home were top of the line with super sweet themed touches. It was clear that no expensive was spared in the design of this home and we surely enjoyed it!
Nice bungalow in an older neighborhood. Some great restaurants a 15 minute walk to downtown Danville. House was spotless, cleaner than most hotel rooms.

The place was so comfortable and clean. It was exactly as described and Brent was quick and extremely helpful in his responses. It is hard to find a place that is wheelchair friendly and it was perfectly suited for my needs. FYI the beds were awesome and so comfy! Totally worth it and hoping to stay here again in the future.
Brent's place was great. Close to downtown. Awesome backyard with hot tub. The house was super clean and well stocked. I would stay here again for sure.

We had a wonderful stay at the bungalow. Brent was beyond accommodating. Proactive on check-in instructions and gave excellent recommendations. The bungalow was very homey with a cozy couch to watch a movie a night and the bed was sooo comfortable. The backyard is so inviting with the fire pit, hot tub and playground for the kiddos. The location was superb, within walking distance of downtown Danville and many distilleries within a half an hours time.
We were very comfortable and pleased with the accommodations! We would highly recommend it.
Great location, super clean and host was proactive with communication. Rental has tons of local information available to help you enjoy your stay!
Great place to explore Danville! Backyard is awesome and private. We loved the tv and the couch was cozy to watch movies on.
Very lovely home that is walkable to downtown Danville. Nicely decorated and comfortable beds! Thanks for a great stay!
This cottage is well decorated, warm and welcoming. Brent communicated well and responded to our requests. Danville is nice small town and lots to do in that section of KY. Would stay again !

we enjoyed an extended stay in Danville while visiting family. it is a quaint town, and this property is close to the downtown area and an easy drive to many things.
The house was the perfect size for me, my husband, and our dog. We appreciated the Treagor grill and well equipped kitchen, and our dog loved the big, fenced on yard.
Great place to stay in Danville. Amenities were excellent. Entire house was well decorated and clean. The mattress were very comfy for an restful night sleep. Brent was a super nice guy and host!

Better than described. From the moment you walk in, you can tell there has been a lot of thought and love put into every inch of the home.
The TV is huge, and the picture quality is pristine.
The beds are the most comfortable of any Airbnb we've stayed.
There is an outdoor play area we were not aware of, and our 4 year old was in paradise!
The fire pit was great for evenings w family, the hot tub was a bonus.
The Star Wars and bourbon theme definitely made it the best money for an Airbnb we may ever experience. Hope we are invited again because my family can't say enough great things
This place is amazing! Highly recommend.
Second time stay and it was a pleasure as always

Really great place. Brent was super to work with. Loved the house - very comfortable and had all the amenities we needed. The backyard was really great - enjoyed the hot tub and the fire pit. Conveniently located. Already thinking about when we can return!

We had a great stay at Brent's charming cottage. We could easily walk to restaurants downtown, and the fire pit was a bonus on chilly evenings. Brent was a responsive host, and Nicole was right next door if we needed anything.
Awesome place to stay look forward to coming back in the future
We enjoyed our stay . It was nice n clean n had all we needed..
Fantastic host and a great place

We had a wonderful stay at this bungalow! It’s absolutely adorable and the little town was perfect. We had great food and so much fun visiting the distilleries and little shops. We definitely want to come back for a visit!

Terrific AirBNB that is clear Brent has put a ton of work in to make perfect. Everything was clean and in great working order, and the house had everything we could have possibly needed for our stay. On top of that, each room was decorated beautifully and we really enjoyed the Yoda/Star Wars theme throughout! Brent was very proactive in messaging us before we arrival and then checking in once we arrived. Definitely a rare gem on here!
Second stay and loved it again! Enjoyed the backyard fire pit and shared Easter dinner with friends. Very helpful and responsive hosts!

I think this is one of the nicest and most comfortable houses I have rented so far. Communication was great and Brent was kind and accommodating. Loved the style and decor of the house and all of the interior and exterior furnishings were top notch and so comfortable and cozy. Even liked the dishes and drinkware and the nice snacks and drinks as well he offered. Just an all round perfect place to stay. He was a fabulous host! I shared with friends and family hoping to encourage them to stay here sometimes too. Even the ladies who cleaned were very sweet. Just the best all of it!!!!

Brent’s place was just what we needed. We were on a family road trip and needed a place to stay for the night. Brent’s place was perfect for our family. The hot tub was an extra nice touch to soothe our travel weary bodies.
We were able to walk to the main street and we found plenty of restaurant options based on the recommendations, including a great coffee shop and even a donut shop.
The house was spotless had all the linens we needed, the bedding was superb and even had sleep number beds that we weren’t expecting, that was a bonus! They had soft drinks and waters in the refrigerator and plenty of snacks, utensils, and other unexpected amenities that made it a wonderful stay. The extra large, smart TV was awesome too. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone looking for a place to stay in the area.
Cozy space with great amenities! Responsive and helpful host! Loved the giant TV for watching March Madness. Will be back in a few weeks!

Thank you so much for sharing your home with us! The house was so spacious and very clean. We had everything we needed. Thank you for the thoughtful touches you include. We loved being so close to downtown and Centre, and would love to stay there again!
Beautiful home! Super clean and had all the amenities you could need. Loved the hot tub and outdoor area!

The place is unbelievable. Tastefully decorated, comfortable, very clean, and well furnished. The kitchen was fully stocked. Everything we needed was there. Loved the wrap-around porch. Easy walking distance to downtown. Brent was a fantastic host.
Brent was extremely responsive and and very proactive to ensure we had everything we needed. The home was adorable and we will definitely rent again

Immaculate!! This is a great place!
Best AirBNB I’ve ever stayed in!

Amazing little place to stay!
Close to everything.
Clean.
Comfortable beds.

If you are looking to be taken care of and have easy access to the fun of downtown Danville this is the place! The bourbon theme is fun and shows the rich history of Kentucky and the house is clean and updated. Brent is an amazing host, couldn’t be happier! We will stay again!
Great house in a working neighborhood, close to downtown. The owner messaged us and was available but not intrusive. Would stay here again.
Brent was a great host. The home was beautiful and just as described in the photos. I would highly recommend this to anyone, especially a Star Wars lover.
very nice. tasteful furnishings. clean. good value for the price.

If we are ever in need of a place to stay in Danville in there future, we will not hesitate to stay here. It was everything we needed, super cute, and Brent was so attentive, excellent at communicating, and was so hospitable. I have already highly recommended it to others.
Awesome decor. Very clean. Everything was perfect.
Great place with everything we needed. Would definitely stay here again.
Great place to stay! Lots of wonderful amenities that I didn't expect which were great touches. It's such a comfortable place in every way!
Great location within 5 minute walk to town. Nicely renovated home with comfortable beds. Easy smart lock access.

The house was exactly as advertised. It was newly renovated and furnished, so any minor quibbles were due to everything being brand new. For example, the cool baby yoda salt and pepper shaker didn’t have any salt or pepper in it. An instruction manual or local guide would have been helpful, but really everything was great and the host was very responsive.
had a great stay at Brett's place. it was super clean, really well decorated, walking distance to restaurants and bars. Would definitely come back.
Great stay, really nice house

What an adorable, cozy place! We loved the quirky mixture of Star Wars (Grogu) and bourbon that is delightfully odd. So clean and with a well stocked kitchen, it had everything we could want and more. Great location as well - right near downtown and Centre. Would love to come back on a future visit.
Great place to stay! Great location and convenient. Very clean and exactly as advertised. Brent is a phenomenal host.

Great location!! This home is spacious, updated and very comfortable. Only a few blocks from downtown Danville and Centre College. Unique Star Wars theme with accessories. Brent was a great communicator and easy to work with. I would definitely stay again!

Loved staying here. Host is beyond amazing. Everything is super simple. Livingroom is able to easily accomadate 6 people. Couch and beds are so comfy. My kids were obsessed with the toaster!! If you stay here you must use it. Neighborhood was quiet and close to town. I honestly could not list anything they could improve on.

New….clean…..wow!!!!!
Highly recommend!!! Very comfortable stay and will stay again if in the area
Second time staying here and everything was great! Place is very clean and check in is easy! We will be back!
Great location close to everything in town. The place was very clean and cute. Host was accommodating with an early check in. Would recommend and will be stay again!
A great place-conveniently located to downtown and Centre’s campus. Walkable to everything we needed. Very clean!

Great location in Danville - easy to walk to shops and restaurants! Host was so kind to work with us adding an additional day (when Centre baseball won the SAA Tournament - Roll Kerns!). Comfortable beds and felt at home with everything we needed. Thanks again!
Last minute booking at 1am responded quickly and got me in no problem! Very nice place fully remodeled and super comfortable. Highly recommend.
Clean, comfortable and good location. Comfy beds and usable kitchen. Would definitely stay again.
Host was very responsive and helpful and the home was really nice!

This was my first time using Airbnb. It was a great experience, personal and for work. Upon walking inside, I felt right at home. Everything from the furniture to the appliances was available. It was homie and cozy. it was easy to contact Adan, very help and quick response to our need. if it is available every time I come to Kentucky. I will stay here again. Thank You Adan
This is a great place to stay if traveling for work or for pleasure! Very convenient and located in a very nice spot for downtown activities. Don’t hesitate to book this place if you are in Danville.
Great stay and easy to get in. Very nice on the inside. Great communication.

Great location & such a cute town!! We went the weekend of Derby, so downtown was alive & a cute farmer's market was happening right down the street! The beds were comfortable & all of the appliances were nice & great! I wish there was more attention to detail on the cleaning- lots of dust & dirt on baseboards, bathroom fans, ceiling fans.
Clean, comfortable, cozy and great location. Can’t ask for more and will stay again.
Great place to stay!

Great location for walking to restaurants, parks, and Centre college. Living space is comfortable for several people to gather to watch TV/movies or play games. Cynthia was very responsive to any questions we had. We would stay again if in Danville.
Our second stay. Great for Centre families, close to downtown and easy walk to the bakery. Everything is clean and beds are super comfy!!
10 out of 10
Great place to stay highly recommend!
We had a great stay - it is a very spacious and clean place! Cynthia was easy to communicate with and very responsive. Bonus that we could bring our dogs!

We couldn't figure out the lock at first and also couldn't figure out how to use the remote for the HVAC. We contacted Cynthia and she responded right away. She was so patient and helpful! The home was so comfortable and nicely decorated. We felt right at home. We could walk everywhere! Church, Centre College, restaurants, the art museum. It was the perfect location! We would definitely stay there again.

Great place, everything is new. Great location close to Centre and downtown, a fun, but not noisy, little bar with awesome outdoor space just down the street (Morley's). Host was awesome, super helpful and responsive. Will be back.

We love staying at Barbara’s properties. This 2 bedroom was perfect for our family during graduation weekend! Easy walk to campus and downtown restaurants. The beds are so comfortable! Barbara is a fantastic host - always welcomes with local bakery treats! And this trip we so appreciated the late checkout which allowed us to enjoy graduation without being rushed. A++ as always!!

Barbara is an amazing host. Our place was well appointed , beds were super comfortable . Love the wifi in bathroom .
Can’t wait to come back.
I love staying here....she's the best! Awesome place and amazing location!!!
Convenient location! Enjoyed our stay. Will definitely book again!

The location is perfect for Centre College and downtown. Walked to dinner both nights. The apartment is spotless and very nice. Beds are comfortable! There were waters in the fridge and pastries from the bakery. Loved it!
Great place! Great location! Above all else, Barbara is fantastic with communication, attention and coordinating your stay! 5 stars across the board!

Another excellent stay! This unit is my new favorite. So quiet, super comfy bedding, efficient and well appointed kitchen. Barbara is a great host and we appreciate the waters and sweets she always welcomes us with! Such a great location walkable to all our favorite spots.
great place to stay in Danville. Barbara was a friendly, helpful host. We had a great weekend and enjoyed all the amenities and treats Barbara kindly provided for our stay.

Barbara’s place is very comfortable, updated, clean, and convenient. It’s a pretty apartment with many thoughtful details. We love being close to both Centre and downtown and would be happy to stay there again! Thank you for having us!

I came to Danville for Family Weekend at Centre College. It was a short distance to campus and my daughter walked over after I arrived.
The apartment far exceeded my expectations with its quality of furnishings and décor. This would be an excellent choice while visiting your student or exploring the local area. Danville is amazing...it has restaurant choices and food quality that are second to none. Once here ( both Danville and this apartment). You will have it all.
If you walk / run, be sure to make it to Millennium Park.
Great place, Barbara !! Great host.
Mark
A Fellow Kentuckian
Centre Dad
Great spot for Centre parents dropping off our daughter for school. It was great location wise and had everything we needed for a quick 2 days in/out. Thanks Barbara.
Great place, great host. You couldn't ask for more !
Always an awesome stay. Barbara is a great host. I have another stay coming up !
Always a great stay. Can't go wrong with this one !
Barbara's place was great! Very clean, well appointed and the location is fantastic. Barbara was readily available.
Great Stay ! I have a couple of long term stay scheduled in the future.
We love staying at the CentreView properties. Barbara is the best host with a perfect place to land every time we are in Danville.
Always like staying at Barbara's places. Great location. Great apartments. Thanks again Barb.

One of the nicest places to stay in Danville.
Barbra had very nice touches and helpful communication. It does get kinda loud down at the bar/ restaurant but we just used some ear plugs and it was ok! Can’t wait to stay there again!
Always a great place to stay. Close to everything that we like to do. It’s the little things that she does. Like goodies from the bakery.
Couldn't ask for better. Great stay!
Top notch!
Nicely appointed space in a great downtown location. Easy parking and check in. Great communication from the host.

Our stay was great - the apartment was easy to find, parking and check in/out was a breeze, and included amenities were perfect for a weekend stay. The location is awesome, although it was fairly noisy Friday and Saturday night, as bar goers hang out to smoke in the shared parking lot. We ended up downloading a white noise/sleep app to drown out the loud talking/laughing which worked just fine. Wouldn’t let that stop me from staying here again!

Perfect place to stay in Danville, especially for Centre parents.
Close to campus and restaurants.
It was the attention to details in this place got it for me.
I would definitely stay here again and recommend it to anyone.

Great spot for exploring Danville, in the heart of downtown, and walkable to Centre College.
We really enjoyed the layout, size, and amenities. The bathroom was great, and laundry facilities were a nice add since I was coming off another trip so that allowed me to minimize packing.
Thanks for a great stay!
Great location, close to everything. Host is by far the best I've ever encoutered.
Apartment was as described.Parking easy. Close to all on Centre College campus.
Great experience. The place is comfortable and is very well appointed.
Awesome location and very nice space with a very home like feel!
We love Danville and our little place away from home. We’ve stayed there three times and rented from Barb fives times. Always a great experience!

Lovely new apartment! Wonderful layout with 2 bedrooms. Location is perfect for a Danville stay. Barbara is such a great host, from the delicious bakery treats to the most comfortable bed I've slept in in some time! Walk to several restaurants and Centre campus.
We love our little home away from home! Great place to stay and convenient to everything!

Barbara is fabulous! She goes above and beyond to make you feel at home. Her places, she has 4 and we have stayed in 2 of them, are well equipped and so comfortable! The beds and pillows are wonderful! They are close to everything downtown. We will be back in January and will always stay at one of her cozy homes away from home.

Barbara has a wonderful space that is very clean and inviting. We enjoyed our weekend stay while visiting our Centre Student. The apartment is located within walking distance to many wonderful restaurants and shops. Also walking distance to the College. We will be back!

Barbara was the perfect hostess. Communication leading up to (as well as during) our stay was just the right amount. The apartment was located in the heart of downtown Danville within walking distance of many places to eat as well as Centre College. We will definitely be back.
Barbara was an exceptional host and property was very clean and comfortable. Will certainly be staying in her properties again in the future.
Barbara is the best! Another great place and she always has her places so clean and updated. Thank you for the goodies too!

We love staying here. It’s very walkable with great restaurants. There’s even a drug store a block away that’s open late if you forgot something. We now plan our trips to Danville around the Loft’s availability!
